DOC.brief_summary: The study examine feasibility effectiveness two different nutritional strategy ( multi‐nutrient supplement food‐related behavioural change ) prevent depression high‐risk overweight European Union citizen . Interventions last 12 month . Design two‐by‐two factorial randomize control prevention trial four intervention group : 1 . Control group ( daily placebo supplement ) 2 . Multi-nutrient supplementation group ( daily multi-nutrient supplement ) 3 . Food-related behavioural change group ( food-related behavioural activation focus improve overall diet + placebo supplement ) 4 . Multi-nutrient supplementation + food-related behavioural activation group ( daily multi-nutrient supplement + food-related behavioural activation focus improve overall diet ) . Follow‐up assessment conduct 3 , 6 , 12 month primary secondary endpoint , intervention compliance , adverse event mediate variables.Data first analyze accord intention‐to‐treat principle , use ( mixed model ) analysis covariance primary secondary endpoint , test effect two nutritional strategy separately well combine .
DOC.brief_title: Multi-country Project Role Diet , Food-related Behavior , Obesity Prevention Depression
DOC.detailed_description: Research show nutrition may important way promote mood health , far researcher know aspects nutrition behaviour important . The study collaboration United Kingdom , Germany , Netherlands Spain , fund European Commission . The trial compare different nutritional lifestyle strategy might promote mood health people overweight . For purpose design two‐by‐two factorial randomize control prevention trial two intervention condition : multi‐nutrient supplement food‐related behavioural change ( FBC ) intervention . A total four intervention group create : control condition ( placebo , FBC intervention ) , placebo FBC intervention , multinutrient supplement FBC intervention , multi‐nutrient supplement FBC intervention.Recruitment : 1000 subject recruit four study site different EU country ( United Kingdom , Germany , Netherlands Spain ) . Participants randomize equal probability four intervention arm use blind computerised randomization procedure.The multinutrient supplement placebo need take every day one year . The multinutrient supplement pill contain omega 3 fatty acid , vitamin D , folic acid , selenium calcium . FBC consist 21 behavioral activation session adopt healthy diet behaviour know explain association food intake depression . Follow‐up assessment conduct researcher unaware randomization status 3 , 6 , 12 month primary secondary outcome . Data first analyze accord intention‐to‐treat principle , use ( mixed model ) analysis covariance primary secondary endpoint , test effect two nutritional strategy separately well combine ( follow 2x2 factorial design trial ) . Per‐protocol analyse mediation analysis conduct examine extent compliance potential mediating mechanism explain impact primary secondary endpoint . Data collection different site conduct accord strict European code ethic conduct well codes Good Clinical Practice , local/national international law regulation , include Declaration Helsinki . In random subsample trial participant ( n=50 per intervention arm ) blood sample collect baseline , 3 12 month measure blood level nutrient provide multi-nutrient supplement .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 75 year Body Mass Index 2540 PHQ9 score ≥ 5 Current ( past 6 month ) clinical Major Depressive Disorder Episode ( accord psychiatric DSMIV criterion determine The MiniInternational Neuropsychiatric Interview 5.0 ( M.I.N.I . 5.0 ) Current ( past 6 month ) use antidepressant drug psychological intervention . History psychosis , bipolar disorder , substance dependence severe , psychiatric disorder require specialized clinical attention . No eat disorder . This measured brief selfreport questionnaire . History bariatric surgery current severe , lifethreatening disease ( assess use selfreport ) , severe cognitive impairment limit conduct study , assess research staff evaluation feasibility conduct screen instrument adequate manner . Currently adhere supervise behavioural intervention intervene MoodFood intervention .
